thread.title: ItsOn CEO Greg Raleigh to Share Insights about Successful Startups at the Telecom Council TC3 Summit
thread.title_full: ItsOn CEO Greg Raleigh to Share Insights about Successful Startups at the Telecom Council TC3 Summit

author: admin
title: ItsOn CEO Greg Raleigh to Share Insights about Successful Startups at the Telecom Council TC3 Summit
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 3:06 PM   ItsOn 
REDWOOD CITY, Calif., Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Dr. Greg Raleigh , CEO and founder of ItsOn Inc ., will take the stage at The Telecom Council of Silicon Valley's TC3 Summit on Wednesday, September 30 in Mountain View, CA. Dr. Raleigh will join a select group of entrepreneurs on the "Startup Success Stories" panel moderated by Derek Kerton, TC3 Summit Chair and Managing Partner of The Kerton Group. 
Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150928/271451LOGO 
The Telecom Council of Silicon Valley's TC3 event gathers together executives from across the wireless ecosystem for a two-day program focused on bringing more innovation to market faster. Dr. Raleigh, who pioneered modern MIMO and mobile cloud-client technologies, will draw on his experience as the founder of multiple successful startups and his current role as CEO of ItsOn. 
Given the rapidly increasing global demand from mobile operators for ItsOn's breakthrough IT cloud solution, Dr. Raleigh will talk about ItsOn's unique approach to innovating and partnering, including how a startup was ultimately able to deliver superior digital experiences to wireless subscribers. 
ItsOn provides an industry-leading service creation and management platform that enables carriers to respond more effectively to changing customer needs, and that is proving crucial as carriers discover they must quickly pivot to meet the challenges of evolving markets and new competition. 
Who : Dr. Greg Raleigh , CEO and founder of ItsOn 
What : "Startup Success Stories" panel 
When : Wednesday, September 30 at 1:45 p.m. PT 
Where : Computer History Museum, 1401 North Shoreline Blvd, Mountain View, CA 
If you'd like to register or learn more about this event, please go here . 
To request a meeting at the event, please email itson@inkhouse.com . 
About ItsOn 
ItsOn is a proven leader in the carrier space, and enables wireless carriers to fundamentally change how mobile services are marketed, delivered and consumed. The company was founded in 2008, launched the world's first end-to-end solution for virtual policy and billing in 2014 and supports key carrier accounts such as Sprint and Virgin Mobile. ItsOn investors include Andreessen Horowitz, Tenaya Capital, Vodafone Ventures and Verizon Investments. The company is privately held and headquartered in Redwood City, CA. For more information, please visit www.itsoninc.com or follow @ItsOnInc on Twitter. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/itson-ceo-greg-raleigh-to-share-insights-about-successful-startups-at-the-telecom-council-tc3-summit-300150241.html 
SOURCE ItsOn
